{{Wireless embedded system |brand=WISE TIGER |model=WT-RT8501 |revision=v1.0 |series=AC1200 |asin=B07CWVR1KH, B06WVTTJRP |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=EDUP |manuf_model=EP-2655 |fcc_date=09/11/2017 |fcc_id=2AMG8WT-RT8501 |pcb_id=800002186 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7620A;MEDIATEK, MT7620A, 1651-BMTH, PTPBYC57H; |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model= |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7620A;MEDIATEK, MT7620A, 1651-BMTH, PTPBYC57H; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7612E;MEDIATEK, MT7612EN, 1652-BMAL, ETPBYF48; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=WIFI-XXXX, WIFI-XXXX-5G |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_pass=admin }}
:• '''867''' Mbps - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''300''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''1200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC1200 Dual Band Wireless Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.wise-tiger.com/English/Product/3021963234.html}} *"800002186 V1.0" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. According to the [https://fccid.io/2AMG8WT-RT8501/Letter/Differences-Description-3555053 Differences Description] document on the FCC, :the following models are identical: * EDUP EP-2655 * EDUP EP-RT9001 * Card King KW-RT6019 * WISE TIGER WT-RT8501 ===See also=== :;[http://www.wise-tiger.com/English/Products/Mobileparts/ WISE TIGER Wireless Adapters] • [[EDUP Wireless Adapters]] *[[WISE TIGER WT-RT8501]] (v1.0/v1.2) - AC1200 Dual Band Wireless Router *[[WISE TIGER WT-P9008]] - AC1200 Wireless USB Adapters • B07CBYY1GH :[[Realtek]] RTL8812BU *[[WISE TIGER WT-AC9008]] - AC1300 Wireless USB Adapters • B01LH0JGP6 *[[WISE TIGER WT-AC9006]] - AC600 Wireless USB Adapters • B01M0Q51UI :[[Realtek]] RTL8811AU • [[EDUP EP-AC1607]] (AC600) • B077HTXG4R *[[WISE TIGER WT-WA9003]] - N300 Wireless USB Adapters • :[[Realtek]] RTL8192CU • [[EDUP EP-9503]] (SU ?) • Driver: [http://www.wise-tiger.com/dl/rtl8192cu/linux.rar rtl8192cu] *[[EDUP ED-MS1559]] - N300 Wireless USB Adapters • B00KV9TQXM :http://www.szedup.com/support/driver-download/ep-ms1559-driver/ *[[EDUP EP-N8553]] - N150 Wireless USB Adapters • B018Z5GUZA :Model: FBA EP-N8553: http://www.szedup.com/?s=8553 __NOTOC__
